Robe of Shadows

armor (lvl 4)

item id [id]: 223
armor id [armor]: 230 (Magic Robes)
protection, body [protbody]: 3
stealth bonus [stealthb]: +20
(ethereal [eth])

Requires 10S to forge (S2)

This robe will make its wearer ethereal and thus almost invulnerable to non-magical damage. It also helps the wielder avoid being seen when sneaking.
